me ehema newe mage yaluwek rata yanda hadane eka nisa yaluwo wagayak ada me laga parti ekak danawa ganulamayekuth innawa unta enna kiyamu.ha eeka hodayi kiya baya nathuwa kiwe ema pirimi lamun athareda gahanu lamayek sitina nisaya.thawamath udasana 9.20ya.chandana eliyata with durakathana amathumak dunnaya machan sure wade hari katthiyama warella monawada aran enne ”monawada chandana hoda” gada gahandath bahane ban mun gewalwalata yawandath onane wayin eekak genen mathak karala ded ros aran waren munge weri bassanna ” hari ehenam onna api enawa” hari waren serama 16 kali harida massina ”hari hari mewa api puruduwenda karana eewa newene” kiya dedenama sinasunaya.onna mage wade hari untika bohoma amaruwen kamathi karawa gaththa kiya chandana geta athulu une boru mawapamak pennum kalaya.tika welawakin wan rathayak achinige niwasa idiripita nawathuni.achini,sigithi,ruwani,chamodi saha chandana dora lagata aawaya.ammo methana yaluwo godakne ayiye.kamak na oyalage amma enneth 6ta witharane neda?achinige piya wides gathawi athi bawin gedara sitinne achinith achinige mawath pamani.awurudu 25th 30th athara wayasa athi yahaluwan athara awurudu 45kenekuda sitiyaya.dan pirimi 7k saha gahanu lamayi 4k saha ganikawak siti maya sugath badinna sitina kena lesa chandana hadunwa dunne gena wayin widuruwalata purawaminya chandana apata tikak dapan api hodata bila aawe munta bonna dipan hodata kiya sure kiwe sinaweminya.menna lamayi bima genawa kiya achini,sigithi,ruwani,chamodi yana thidenata hodin purawapu wayin widuru 4k dunnaya.wathura kalawam karapu wayin widuru 8k chandana saha yahaluwan tika panaya karaya.me widiyata wayin bothalaya iwara wanase gahanu lamayita bonna dunne 4denagema adum galawime balaporoththuwenya.sugath mowunta werida kiya balimata upayak yeduwaya.achini bonna kul mokuth nadda?thiyanawa ayiye mama aran ennam kiya nagitinawath samagama achini watimata giyaya.menna niyama gana kiya chandana, sugath, sure, roma, suga, wije, piyadasata siyallanma amathuwe (piya)kiyaya mohu awurudu45 kenaya achini kul bima genawath kisiwek eya panaya nokalaya.api sinduwak dala natamu tikak kiya wije kiwaya.anna niyama adahasa kiya chandana nagita setap eka damuwaya.ahankara nagare…..

labana wasare pawathwena kanishta loka kusalana ragar tharagamalawata sudusukam laba ganime tharagawaliyata ekwime awasthawa himiwana aasiyanu kanishta awurudu 20n pahala ragar tharagawaliya me masa 21da kolambaa di aarambha kere.shri lankawa samaga honkon, dakunu koriyawa saha china thayipe kandayam sahabhagi wana me tharagawaliya 27da dakwa kolambaa thuranga tharaga pitiye di pawathwe.labana wasare aga pawathwena loka kusalana kanishta ragar tharagamalawata aasiyawen me wanawita japanaya sudusukam laba sitina athara eeta ekwana dewani aasiyanu kandayama thoraganime tharagawaliya labana wasare pruthugalaye pawathwena athara eeta ekwime kadima awasthawak mewara tharagawaliyen shri lankawata udawi thibe.ema tharagawaliyata ekwime balaporoththuwen pasuwana honkon ha dakunu koriyawa wethin me tharagawaliye di shri lankawata prabala abhiyogayak wuwa da sathkarakathwaya himiwima matha ema awasthawa athkaraganimata shri lanka pila balaporoththuwen pasuweyi.thrithwa widuhal pile nayaka tharinda rathwaththe shri lanka kandayama meheyawime wagakima darana athara pasugiya pasal ragar tharagawaraye di thrithwa shuratha dinu isipathana widuhale puhunukaru nilfar ibrahim shri lanka pile puhunukaru lesa katayuthu karayi.
